00001 /* 
00002  * jcom.saturation
00003  * External for Jamoma: add harmonic distortion (overdrive/saturation) to a signal
00004  * By Tim Place, Copyright © 2005

00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 #define NUM_INPUTS 2
00013 #define NUM_OUTPUTS 2
00014 
00015 // Data Structure for this object
00016 typedef struct _saturation{
00017     t_pxobject          x_obj;                                  // Required by MSP (must be first)
00018     void                        *obex;
00019     tt_overdrive        *overdrive;
00020     tt_copy                     *copy;
00021     tt_audio_signal     *signal_in[NUM_INPUTS];
00022     tt_audio_signal     *signal_out[NUM_OUTPUTS];
00023     float                       attr_overdrive;                 // ATTRIBUTE: amount of overdrive
00024     long                        attr_bypass_dcblocker;
00025     long                        attr_bypass;
00026         long                    attr_mode;
00027         long                    attr_mute;
00028         float                   attr_preamp_db;
00029 } t_saturation;
00030 
00031 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message type:
00032 void *saturation_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00033 t_int *saturation_perform(t_int *w);
00034 t_int *saturation_perform2(t_int *w);
00035 void saturation_dsp(t_saturation *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);
00036 void saturation_assist(t_saturation *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);
00037 t_max_err saturation_setsaturation(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00038 t_max_err saturation_setbypass_dcblocker(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00039 t_max_err saturation_setbypass_overdrive(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00040 t_max_err saturation_setmode(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00041 t_max_err saturation_setpreamp(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00042 t_max_err saturation_setmute(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00043 void saturation_anything(t_saturation *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00044 void set_bypass(t_saturation *x);
00045 void saturation_clear(t_saturation *x);
00046 void saturation_free(t_saturation *x);

00048 // Globals
00049 t_class         *saturation_class;                                      // Required. Global pointing to this class
00050 t_symbol        *ps_symbol;
00051 t_symbol        *ps_long;
00052 t_symbol        *ps_float32;
00053 t_symbol        *ps_dumpout;

00055 /************************************************************************************/
00056 // Main() Function
00057 
00058 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00059 {
00060         long attrflags = 0;
00061         t_class *c;
00062         t_object *attr;
00063         
00064         jamoma_init();
00065         ps_symbol = gensym("symbol");
00066         ps_long = gensym("long");
00067         ps_float32 = gensym("float32");
00068         ps_dumpout = gensym("dumpout");
00069 
00070         // Define our class
00071         c = class_new("jcom.saturation~",(method)saturation_new, (method)saturation_free, (short)sizeof(t_saturation), 
00072                 (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00073         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_saturation, obex));
00074 
00075         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00076         class_addmethod(c, (method)saturation_dsp,                                      "dsp",                                  A_CANT, 0);
00077     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,                     "dumpout",                              A_CANT, 0);  
00078     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,                    "quickref",                     A_CANT, 0);
00079     class_addmethod(c, (method)saturation_assist,                               "assist",                               A_CANT, 0);
00080         class_addmethod(c, (method)saturation_clear,                            "clear",                                0);
00081         class_addmethod(c, (method)saturation_setpreamp,                        "/preamp",                              A_GIMME, 0);
00082         class_addmethod(c, (method)saturation_setsaturation,            "/saturation",                  A_GIMME, 0);
00083         class_addmethod(c, (method)saturation_setmode,                          "/mode",                                A_GIMME, 0);
00084         class_addmethod(c, (method)saturation_setbypass_dcblocker,      "/dcblocker/bypass",    A_GIMME, 0);
00085         class_addmethod(c, (method)saturation_setmute,                          "/audio/mute",                  A_GIMME, 0);
00086         class_addmethod(c, (method)saturation_anything,                         "anything",                             A_GIMME, 0);
00087 
00088         // Add attributes to our class:
00089         // ATTRIBUTE: overdrive
00090         attr = attr_offset_new("overdrive", ps_float32, attrflags,
00091                 (method)0L, (method)saturation_setsaturation, calcoffset(t_saturation, attr_overdrive));
00092         class_addattr(c, attr);
00093 
00094         // ATTRIBUTE: bypass_dcblocker (toggle)
00095         attr = attr_offset_new("bypass_dcblocker", ps_long, attrflags,
00096                 (method)0L, (method)saturation_setbypass_dcblocker, calcoffset(t_saturation, attr_bypass_dcblocker));
00097         class_addattr(c, attr);
00098 
00099         // ATTRIBUTE: bypass_overdrive (toggle)
00100         attr = attr_offset_new("bypass", ps_long, attrflags,
00101                 (method)0L, (method)0L, calcoffset(t_saturation, attr_bypass));
00102         class_addattr(c, attr);
00103 
00104         // ATTRIBUTE: mode (int)
00105         attr = attr_offset_new("mode", ps_long, attrflags,
00106                 (method)0L, (method)saturation_setmode, calcoffset(t_saturation, attr_mode));
00107         class_addattr(c, attr);
00108         
00109         // ATTRIBUTE: preamp
00110         attr = attr_offset_new("preamp", ps_float32, attrflags,
00111                 (method)0L, (method)saturation_setpreamp, calcoffset(t_saturation, attr_preamp_db));
00112         class_addattr(c, attr);
00113 
00114         // Setup our class to work with MSP
00115         class_dspinit(c);
00116 
00117         // Finalize our class
00118         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00119         saturation_class = c;
00120         return 0;
00121 }

00124 /************************************************************************************/
00125 // Object Life
00126 
00127 // Create
00128 void *saturation_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00129 {
00130         t_saturation *x = (t_saturation *)object_alloc(saturation_class);
00131         short i;
00132         
00133         if(x){
00134                 object_obex_store((void *)x, ps_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x,NULL)); // dumpout      
00135                 dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, 2);                                                  // Create object with 2 inlets
00136             x->x_obj.z_misc = Z_NO_INPLACE;                                             // ESSENTIAL!                   
00137                 outlet_new((t_object *)x, "signal");                                    // Create signal outlet
00138                 outlet_new((t_object *)x, "signal");                                    // Create signal outlet 
00139 
00140                 tt_audio_base::set_global_sr((int)sys_getsr());                         // Set Tap.Tools global SR...
00141                 tt_audio_base::set_global_vectorsize(sys_getblksize()); // Set Tap.Tools global vector size...
00142 
00143                 x->overdrive = new tt_overdrive;                                                // Tap.Tools Blue Objects
00144                 x->copy = new tt_copy;
00145 
00146                 for(i=0; i<NUM_INPUTS; i++)
00147                         x->signal_in[i] = new tt_audio_signal;
00148                 for(i=0; i<NUM_OUTPUTS; i++)
00149                         x->signal_out[i] = new tt_audio_signal;
00150 
00151                 x->attr_overdrive = 1.;                                                                 // Defaults
00152                 x->attr_bypass_dcblocker = 0;
00153             x->attr_bypass = 0;
00154                 x->attr_mode = 1;
00155                 x->attr_mute = 0;
00156                 x->overdrive->set_attr(tt_overdrive::k_mode, 1);
00157                 x->attr_preamp_db = 0;
00158 
00159                 attr_args_process(x,argc,argv);                                                 // handle attribute args                                        
00160         }
00161         return (x);                                                                                                     // Return the pointer
00162 }
00163 
00164 // Destroy
00165 void saturation_free(t_saturation *x)
00166 {
00167         short i;
00168         
00169         dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);                                      // Always call dsp_free first in this routine
00170         delete x->overdrive;
00171         delete x->copy;
00172         for(i=0; i<NUM_INPUTS; i++)
00173                 delete x->signal_in[i];
00174         for(i=0; i<NUM_OUTPUTS; i++)
00175                 delete x->signal_out[i];
00176 }

00180 
00181 // Method for Assistance Messages
00182 void saturation_assist(t_saturation *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00183 {
00184         if(msg==1)                      // Inlet
00185                 strcpy(dst, "(signal) Input, (anything) attributes");
00186         else if(msg==2){        // Outlet
00187                 switch(arg){
00188                         case 0: strcpy(dst, "(signal) output"); break;
00189                         case 1: strcpy(dst, "(signal) output"); break;
00190                         case 2: strcpy(dst, "dumpout"); break;
00191                 }
00192         }
00193 }

00195 
00196 // Clear Message
00197 void saturation_clear(t_saturation *x)
00198 {
00199         x->overdrive->clear();
00200 }

00203 // ATTRIBUTE: Overdrive
00204 t_max_err saturation_setsaturation(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00205 {
00206         x->attr_overdrive = atom_getfloat(argv);
00207         x->overdrive->set_attr(tt_overdrive::k_drive, x->attr_overdrive);
00208         
00209         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00210         #pragma unused(attr)
00211 }

00214 // ATTRIBUTE: Bypass the DC Blocker
00215 t_max_err saturation_setbypass_dcblocker(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00216 {
00217         x->attr_bypass_dcblocker = atom_getlong(argv);
00218         x->overdrive->set_attr(tt_overdrive::k_defeat_dcblocker, x->attr_bypass_dcblocker);
00219         
00220         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00221         #pragma unused(attr)
00222 }

00224 
00225 t_max_err saturation_setmute(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00226 {
00227         x->attr_mute = atom_getlong(argv);
00228         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00229 }
00230 
00231 
00232 // ATTRIBUTE: Mode that the overdrive uses for calculation
00233 t_max_err saturation_setmode(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00234 {
00235         if(argv->a_type == A_SYM){
00236                 if(argv->a_w.w_sym == gensym("sinus"))
00237                         x->attr_mode = 1;
00238                 else if(argv->a_w.w_sym == gensym("s-shaped"))
00239                         x->attr_mode = 0;
00240                 else
00241                         error("jcom.saturation - invalid mode specified");
00242         }
00243         else
00244                 x->attr_mode = atom_getlong(argv);
00245                 
00246         x->overdrive->set_attr(tt_overdrive::k_mode, x->attr_mode);
00247         
00248         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00249         #pragma unused(attr)
00250 }

00254 void saturation_anything(t_saturation *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00255 {
00256         //post("anything: %s", msg->s_name);
00257 }

00260 t_max_err saturation_setpreamp(t_saturation *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00261 {
00262         x->attr_preamp_db = atom_getfloat(argv);
00263         x->overdrive->set_attr(tt_overdrive::k_preamp, x->attr_preamp_db);
00264         
00265         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00266         #pragma unused(attr)

00270 
00271 // Perform Method: mono
00272 t_int *saturation_perform(t_int *w)
00273 {
00274         t_saturation *x = (t_saturation *)(w[1]);               
00275         x->signal_in[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[2]));
00276         x->signal_out[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[3]));
00277         x->signal_in[0]->vectorsize = (int)(w[4]);
00278 
00279         if(x->x_obj.z_disabled || x->attr_mute) 
00280                 goto out;
00281 
00282         if(x->attr_bypass == 0)
00283                 x->overdrive->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_out[0]);
00284         else
00285                 x->copy->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_out[0]);
00286 out:
00287         return (w+5);
00288 }
00289 
00290 
00291 // Perform Method: stereo
00292 t_int *saturation_perform2(t_int *w)
00293 {
00294         t_saturation *x = (t_saturation *)(w[1]);               
00295         x->signal_in[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[2]));
00296         x->signal_in[1]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[3]));
00297         x->signal_out[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[4]));
00298         x->signal_out[1]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[5]));
00299         x->signal_in[0]->vectorsize = (int)(w[6]);
00300 
00301         if(x->x_obj.z_disabled || x->attr_mute) 
00302                 goto out;
00303         
00304         if(x->attr_bypass == 0)
00305                 x->overdrive->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_in[1], x->signal_out[0], x->signal_out[1]);
00306         else
00307                 x->copy->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_in[1], x->signal_out[0], x->signal_out[1]);
00308 out:
00309         return (w+7);
00310 }
00311 
00312 
00313 // DSP Method
00314 void saturation_dsp(t_saturation *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00315 {
00316         x->overdrive->set_sr((int)sp[0]->s_sr);
00317         x->overdrive->clear();
00318         
00319         if(count[1])
00320                 dsp_add(saturation_perform2, 6, x, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[1]->s_vec, sp[2]->s_vec, sp[3]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n);
00321         else
00322                 dsp_add(saturation_perform, 4, x, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[2]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n);
00323 }
